paragraph.paragraph:
The Project Items folder properties are accessible from the Visual Studio .NET ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfPropertyBrowser.htmproperties window. To view the properties window:
Select the Project Items folder in your EiffelEnvision ../../../structure/project.xmlProject.
Choose View, Properties menu. The properties window may also been shown for any selected item by pressing the F4 keyboard shortcut.

The Project Items folder, of an EiffelEnvision ../../../structure/project.xmlProject, is a extended version of a ../../../structure/project_items/clusters_and_items/explicit_clusters.xmlExplicit Cluster Folder. As a result it shares the same properties. Please see the documentation on clusters.xmlExplicit Cluster Folder Properties for Project Items folder properties.
